title: Immunization
description: Many people with MS have concerns about the safety of routine vaccinations. Some, but not all, immunizations have been evaluated for safety and efficacy in people with MS.
cleaned_text: An MS Research Revolution Support MS Research Understanding and ending MS can't come fast enough - it will take all of us working together. It's easy to be a champion for MS Research - join us and proudly let everyone know that you're helping to lead the MS Research Revolution.
